spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout and room adjacencies are good. Most walls are accurately placed. Some minor dimensional scaling issues apparent. Windows are mostly missing or represented by wall cutouts. The 'W/C' area is mislabeled as 'CLOSET' in the 3D render, although the structural elements are present.

structural_fidelity.notes: Cutaway view is correct, and all structural elements appear complete. No major hallucinations. UI/Annotation Cleanliness failed due to text labels 'UP', 'DN', 'CLOSET', '3068'. Presentation Context failed due to a visible ground plane and lack of true dark neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Most major furniture pieces are present and in the correct rooms. The pantry is missing its door, and some kitchen layout details (e.g., specific counter shapes, islands) differ slightly. The W/C area has a toilet but no sink, and the 'CLOSET' adjacent to it has a toilet instead of a closet representation. The 'CLOSET' near the foyer is missing its door.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Geometry style is mostly low-poly with flat shaded surfaces, but there are some slight gradients/shading variations which suggest more than pure flat colors. Lighting is soft, but there are noticeable shadows on walls and furniture, indicating more than minimal shadows. The camera appears to be an isometric projection, but the 45-degree rotation isn't perfectly maintained, and the background isn't truly neutral/dark.

detected_errors.description: Slight texture/gradient on surfaces, and more prominent shadows than minimal.
W/C area missing sink. Closet near foyer missing door. Pantry missing door. 'CLOSET' next to W/C incorrectly contains a toilet.
Windows are mostly missing or misrepresented as simple wall cutouts without distinct frames/sills.
Ground plane visible and background is light gray rather than dark neutral.

summary: The 3D render achieves a passing score, demonstrating strong spatial accuracy and structural completeness, though it is significantly penalized for the presence of text labels and minor aesthetic deviations.
